title: account
name: account
description: BETA An account to track times, expenses, projects, usages, etc. Those are single entry accounts, opposed to double entry accounting in bookkeeping accounts.

number.description: Unique number assigned by you or if empty SK account number schema.

balance.description: The account balance is the sum of all entries, also those from sub-accounts.

contact_id.description: The contacts uuid to which the account is related.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

creator_id.description: The user uuid who created the record.

lock_version.description: Increased on every edit, so SK can detect/prevent a concurrent edit by another user. First save wins.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

filter[q].title: Search
filter[q].description: Wildcard search in number, name, description

filter[parent_id].title: By parent
filter[parent_id].description: Search children of the given account.

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
